DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the feasibility of modified Constraint-Induced Aphasia Therapy (CIAT) in the early sub-acute stage and to examine the efficacy of modified CIAT versus standard treatment with the same intensity of intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Modified Constraint-Induced Aphasia Therapy Schedule to Treat Patients Following Sub-acute Stroke
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of firstever stroke aphasia in subacute stage german speakers presence of residual aphasia dysarthria and apraxia of speech
DOC.keyword: Rehabilitation of Speech and Language Disorders
